web_snippets: Teresa Grimes walking the halls interacting with staff, patients and families. “I am the hospital and nursing home administrator,” said Grimes.
Teresa Grimes. Director: Five Women Painters. Teresa Grimes is known for Five Women Painters (1989), Bootstrapped (2015) and Hallucinations (2020).
Teresa Grimes who helps care for patients and staff at Washington County Hospital and Nursing Home.
